  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112248</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112248</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Živimo zdravo!</string>
            <string language="en">Eating healthy!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Essen gesund!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Manger sain !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comer saudável!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Consumo sano!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανάλωση υγιής!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡El comer sano!</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Z iskanjem pravilnih odgovorov se prebijemo skozi labirint. Poslušaš v šoli, poslušaš doma, kaj moraš početi, česa ne smeš jesti... Grozno. Pa vendar, potihem dobro veš, da imajo odrasli prav. Kaj pa meniš ti? Sledi puščicam in nepravilne odgovore prečrtaj.</string>
            <string language="en">Mind map of eating healthy (recreation, choosing food, drinking enough, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">rekreacija</string>
            <string language="en">recreation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hrana</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">voda</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zdravje</string>
            <string language="en">health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">miselni vzorec</string>
            <string language="en">mind map</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sinneskarte des Essens gesund (Erholung, wählende 
Nahrung, genug trinkend...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carte d'esprit de manger saine (récréation, nourriture 
de choix, buvant assez...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapa da mente de comer saudável (recreação, alimento 
escolhendo, bebendo bastantes...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di mente di consumo sano (ricreazione, alimento 
di scelta, beventi abbastanza...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτης μυαλού της κατανάλωσης υγιής (αναψυχή, 
επιλέγοντας τα τρόφιμα, που πίνουν αρκετούς...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Correspondencia de la mente de comer sana 
(reconstrucción, alimento que elige, bebiendo bastantes...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erholung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sinneskarte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">santé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carte d'esprit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
